QuestData.Title: Hot On the Trail: The Riverpaw Clan
QuestData.Description: Seeing as how we have no other leads, we may as well chase down the information you got.$B$BThere are a couple of Riverpaw gnoll camps in the area. Track them down and search for clues. Bring back anything that you might find. Isolate your search to the Riverpaw gnolls and scouts.
QuestData.RewardText: Is this supposed to be some kind of joke, because I'm not laughing. Bits and pieces of red cloth? What the hell is this supposed to mean?
